title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
summary: Set in the Jazz Age, this novel portrays the American Dream through the eyes of Jay Gatsby, a mysterious millionaire, and Nick Carraway, his neighbor. It explores themes of love, wealth, and the pursuit of happiness.

author: George Orwell
summary: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian regime, where the government controls every aspect of life and even thoughts are monitored. It follows the life of Winston Smith as he rebels against the oppressive regime.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
summary: A classic romance novel following the lives of the Bennet sisters, particularly Elizabeth Bennet, as they navigate love, marriage, and societal expectations in early 19th-century England.
